          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Eating a hard sweet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Essen eines harten Bonbons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Manger un bonbon dur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comendo um doce duro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Consumo del dolce duro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανάλωση ενός σκληρού γλυκού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comer un dulce duro</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows why sucking a sweet in one piece takes a longer time than crushing the sweet.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crushing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hardness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">saliva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sucking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sweets</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, warum das Saugen eines 
Bonbons im Einteiler eine längere Zeit als dauert, den Bonbon 
zerquetschend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre pourquoi la succion 
d'un bonbon dans l'une seule pièce prend un plus long temps 
qu'écrasant le bonbon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra porque sugar um doce em 
uma parte faz exame de um tempo mais longo do que esmagando o doce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra perchè succhiare un 
dolce in un pezzo solo occorre tempo maggiore che schiacciando il 
dolce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει γιατί η απορρόφηση ενός 
γλυκού στο ένα κομμάτι παίρνει έναν πιό μακροχρόνιο χρόνο από
συντρίβοντας το γλυκό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra porqué aspirar un 
dulce en una sola pieza toma un tiempo más largo que machacando el 
dulce.</string>
          </description>
